title: Tenacity
content:
Tenacity is a gear primary ability in the Splatoon series.

Tenacity gradually fills the special gauge only when the user's team has fewer active players than the opponent's team.

A player is active when their player icon on the top of the screen is colored in. The rate at which Tenacity fills the special gauge is unaffected by Special Charge Up. Table is for Splatoon 3.

Tenacity is the primary ability of:

- ▼ Will no longer fill the special gauge prior to the start of the match in the event of a disconnected teammate.

- ▲ Increased special gauge refill rate by 20% while Tenacity is active.

Additionally, Murch or Spyke can replace the primary ability on a piece of headgear with Tenacity by using 15 of each of the following ability chunks:

- Special Charge Up

- Special Saver

- Special Power Up

- ▲ Increased the speed at which the special gauge fills while the conditions are met.

- In a Private Battle, if the teams are uneven, Tenacity charges the special gauge of players on the team with fewer people before the game starts, on the screen that says "Ready? GO!"
